names.english: picrorrhiza and mume decoction to calm roundworms
names.commonEnglish: Picrorhiza and Mume Decoction to Calm Roundworms

actions: Clears Heat, drains Damp-Heat and reduces childhood nutritional impairment.
Kills parasites, warms the Middle Jiao, disperses Cold, dispels Dampness, relieves diarrhea and alleviates abdominal pain.
Expels roundworms, astringes the Intestines, stops diarrhea and alleviates pain.
Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
Kills parasites, regulates Qi, reduces accumulations, drains downward and unblocks the bowels.

syndromes: Roundworms due to Liver and Stomach Heat (relatively mild cases)
